asset.prompt: A cinematic, hyper-detailed, slightly unsettling upper-body character portrait of Big Al, with a menacing expression. He is the carnival manager, a huge man with a thick mustache and coal-black eyes narrowed in a threatening glare. He is wearing a loud, checkered jacket. The scene is illuminated from below, casting his face in deep, monstrous shadows. The overall style emphasizes detailed textures and a slightly distorted, wide-angle perspective.
